00023 using System;
00024 using MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources;

00026 namespace MathNet.Numerics.Distributions

00050     public sealed class ArbitraryDistribution : DiscreteDistribution
00051     {
00052         int _first;
00053         double[] _pmf;
00054         double[] _cdf;
00055         int _last, _n;
00056         double _mean, _variance;
00057 
00058         #region Construction
00059 
00060 
00061 
00062 
00063         public
00064         ArbitraryDistribution()
00065             : base()
00066         {
00067             SetDistributionParameters(0, 1.0);
00068         }
00069 
00078         public
00079         ArbitraryDistribution(
00080             RandomSource random
00081             )
00082             : base(random)
00083         {
00084             SetDistributionParameters(0, 1.0);
00085         }
00086 
00091         public
00092         ArbitraryDistribution(
00093             int offset,
00094             params double[] probabilityMass
00095             )
00096             : base()
00097         {
00098             SetDistributionParameters(offset, probabilityMass);
00099         }
00100         #endregion
00101 
00102         #region Distribution Parameters
00103 
00104 
00105 
00106         public int FirstIndex
00107         {
00108             get { return _first; }
00109         }
00110 
00114         public int LastIndex
00115         {
00116             get { return _last; }
00117         }
00118 
00122         public int Count
00123         {
00124             get { return _n; }
00125         }
00126 
00130         public
00131         void
00132         SetDistributionParameters(
00133             int offset,
00134             params double[] probabilityMass
00135             )
00136         {
00137             if(!IsValidParameterSet(offset, probabilityMass))
00138             {
00139                 throw new ArgumentException(Properties.Resources.ArgumentParameterSetInvalid);
00140             }
00141 
00142             _first = offset;
00143             _n = probabilityMass.Length;
00144             _last = offset + _n - 1;
00145 
00146             if(_pmf == null || _pmf.Length < _n || _pmf.Length >= 4 * _n)
00147             {
00148                 _pmf = new double[_n];
00149                 _cdf = new double[_n];
00150             }
00151 
00152             // prepare probability mass function
00153             Array.Copy(probabilityMass, _pmf, _n);
00154 
00155             // precompute cumulated distribution function
00156             _cdf[0] = _pmf[0];
00157             for(int i = 1; i < _n; i++)
00158             {
00159                 _cdf[i] = _cdf[i - 1] + _pmf[i];
00160             }
00161 
00162             // precompute mean/variance
00163             _mean = 0;
00164             _variance = 0;
00165             for(int i = 0, x = _first; i < _n; i++, x++)
00166             {
00167                 _mean += x * _pmf[i];
00168                 _variance += x * x * _pmf[i];
00169             }
00170 
00171             _variance -= _mean * _mean;
00172         }
00173 
00180         public static
00181         bool
00182         IsValidParameterSet(
00183             int offset,
00184             params double[] probabilityMass
00185             )
00186         {
00187             if(null == probabilityMass)
00188             {
00189                 throw new ArgumentNullException("probabilityMass");
00190             }
00191 
00192             double sum = 0.0;
00193             for(int i = 0; i < probabilityMass.Length; i++)
00194             {
00195                 sum += probabilityMass[i];
00196             }
00197 
00198             return Number.AlmostEqual(1.0, sum, 10 + 2 * probabilityMass.Length);
00199         }
00200         #endregion
00201 
00202         #region Distribution Properties
00203

00206         public override int Minimum
00207         {
00208             get { return _first; }
00209         }
00210 
00214         public override int Maximum
00215         {
00216             get { return _last; }
00217         }
00218 
00222         public override double Mean
00223         {
00224             get { return _mean; }
00225         }
00226 
00233         public override int Median
00234         {
00235             get { throw new NotSupportedException(); }
00236         }
00237 
00241         public override double Variance
00242         {
00243             get { return _variance; }
00244         }
00245 
00249         public override double Skewness
00250         {
00251             get { throw new NotSupportedException(); }
00252         }
00253 
00257         public override
00258         double
00259         ProbabilityMass(
00260             int x
00261             )
00262         {
00263             if(x < _first || x > _last)
00264             {
00265                 return 0.0;
00266             }
00267 
00268             return _pmf[x - _first];
00269         }
00270 
00274         public override
00275         double
00276         CumulativeDistribution(
00277             double x
00278             )
00279         {
00280             if(x < _first)
00281             {
00282                 return 0.0;
00283             }
00284 
00285             int xx = (int)Math.Floor(x);
00286             if(xx <= _last)
00287             {
00288                 return _cdf[xx - _first];
00289             }
00290 
00291             return 1.0;
00292         }
00293 
00294         #endregion
00295 
00296         #region Generator
00297 
00298 
00299 
00300         public override
00301         int
00302         NextInt32()
00303         {
00304             double rnd = this.RandomSource.NextDouble();
00305             if(rnd >= _cdf[_n - 1])
00306             {
00307                 return _last;
00308             }
00309 
00310             // TODO: consider using binary search instead
00311             int index = 0;
00312             while(_cdf[index] < rnd)
00313             {
00314                 index++;
00315             }
00316 
00317             return index + _first;
00318         }
00319         #endregion
00320     }
